data.title: Historical and political implications of haemophilia in the Spanish royal family
data.meta_description: The political implications of haemophilia in the marriage of King Alfonso XIII of Spain and Princess Victoria Eugenie Battenberg of England have been reviewed in recent books on history. However, the fact that they had haemophilic sons also affected their personal relationship. In this article, we r â€¦
